reviews.review: Super fun game, so glad i am getting back into it again. :)

Bi kere internet 39 çekerken 6900 ping nasıl oluyor bu kadar ünlü ve güzel Bir oyunda böyle hataların olması çok saçma. Lütfen düzeltin.
For one thing, it's ridiculous how 6900 pings happen when you're shooting internet 39, and it's ridiculous that such mistakes happen in such a famous and beautiful game. Please correct it.

csgo is a very good game that you could play with friends, I really recommend checking it.
Pros in the game:
- It is free
- It has multiplayer
- You can download workshop maps
Cons in the game:
- Joining a competitive match takes time and is really long
- Local servers take a lot of time to join in to (i think it's because of all the maps they put in them)
- If the host of a workshop map (your friend probably) leaves then the game will tell you "Connection lost"
